title: Brains Over Brawn
description: "Kneeling there, naked, I couldn't believe that I'd gotten myself into this fucking predicament. There I was, a senior, captain of the soccer team, one of the most popular guys in school, humiliating myself in front of this sophomore math nerd.When school football captain Alex decides to cheat in an exam, he does not expect to be caught, least of all by the "little ass-kissing teacher's aide" Ryan!Words: approx 48000
author: MaineBoyXY
